      Methods in todoapp.model with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      addTask adds a new Task object to the selectedList field inside of AppState.

      addTask adds a new Task object to the ToDoLists associated Task List.
      void AppState.removeTask(Task task)
      removeTask removes Task object from the tasks field inside of AppState.
      void ToDoList.removeTask(Task task)
      removeTask removes a specific Task object from the ToDoLists associated Task list.
